comment.author: 60480032@N04
comment._content: Elizabeth Amsden died on July 19, 1966 (see her obituary in the July 21, 1966 New York Times (as Mrs. G. Chaminadas)). Her obituary lists her sister as Mrs. Walter MacCornack, That information led to their parents names (Elbridge Frank and Algina Ida Amsden) and the family's entry in the 1900 census. In the census, the couple's daughter Hattie J. Amsden is listed as a vocalist. I believe Elizabeth Amsden was born Hattie Josephine Amsden on October 9, 1881 (familysearch.org/pal:/MM9.1.1/F4YY-4BF)..
